feed.title: Pokemon Go News
feed.subtitle: Sourcing all of the latest Pokemon Go Information

entry.title: Raid Bosses changes: March 5th, 2018
entry.summary: Rayquaza’s recent victory over Groudon and Kyogre brought us more than just weather boosted Egg hatches: double XP and a raid boss shake up!

entry.title: Claydol Raid Boss Guide
entry.summary: In this guide you will learn how to take down this Tier 3 raid boss.

entry.title: Charizard Raid Boss Guide
entry.summary: In this guide, you will learn how to handle Charizard in the Raid Boss scene.

entry.title: Exeggutor Raid Boss Guide
entry.summary: Exeggutor can be easily soloed just like any other Tier 2 Raid boss. But don’t sleep on him. If you’re looking for an easy solo with a great Pokemon, Exeggutor might be your best option.

entry.title: Slowbro Raid Boss Guide
entry.summary: Like all other Tier 2 Raid bosses, Slowbro can be easily soloed and has a wide variety of available counters. The question with Slowbro raid is not whether or not you can do it, but rather should you do it.
